text: Tsurugi Shrine, also known as Oda Myojin, is a Shinto shrine located in Oda, Echizen Town, Nyu District, Fukui Prefecture. It is classified as a Shinto shrine in the Engishiki and is one of the two main shrines in Echizen Province. Its former rank was a Kokuhei Shōsha (national shrine of lower rank), and it is now listed as a Beppyo shrine of the Association of Shinto Shrines. It is the Ninomiya of Echizen Province == Other websites == * Tsurugi Shrine - Official Site * Sword Shrine - Kokugakuin University 21st Century COE Program "Shinto Shrine Historical Materials Collection" Category:Beppyo shrines Category:Kokuhei Shōsha Category:Ninomiya Category:Fukui Prefecture
title: Tsurugi Shrine
